title: Majestic Crest Condos
description:
Introducing an exceptional unfurnished rental opportunity in the heart of Wavertree Garden Suburb - 35 Wavertree Nook Road, L15. Priced at £1,750 per month, this remarkable property stands out as a rare find in immaculate condition. With immediate availability, this residence offers a unique chance to experience refined living.

Nestled within the picturesque conservation area of Wavertree Garden Suburb, this distinguished semi-detached family home, expertly presented by Move Residential, boasts four bedrooms. A harmonious blend of classic charm and contemporary elegance defines this property, where original features seamlessly merge with modern elements, creating an alluring living space.

Step inside to a luminous and spacious entrance hall that seamlessly transitions into the first reception room. Infused with natural light, this enchanting dining room boasts flawless finishes, making it an ideal spot for formal dining or a cozy family sitting area. The generously sized open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area offers ample workspace, adorned with stylish wall and base units, a striking Belfast sink, and a convenient breakfast bar. The focal point is a captivating exposed brick chimney breast, elegantly framing the range cooker. Completing the ground floor are a practical utility room and a WC, adding to the convenience of this home.

Journeying to the first floor reveals three generously proportioned double bedrooms, each meticulously finished and flooded with sunlight. The master bedroom features a sleek en suite shower, enhancing the sense of luxury. Ascending further, the loft space unveils the fourth spacious bedroom, accompanied by two sizable storage cupboards. A lavish three-piece family bathroom, fully tiled for a spa-like ambiance, takes center stage, offering a rejuvenating jet spa bath, a shower, and an integrated television for a tranquil retreat.

Outside, the property exudes curb appeal with its lush front garden mirroring the verdant surroundings. A sizeable driveway facilitates off-road parking. The rear of the property boasts a substantial garden adorned with trees and shrubs, accompanied by an elevated decked area, creating an enviable outdoor space for leisure and recreation.

This rental opportunity is a true gem, combining timeless allure with contemporary comfort. Don't miss the chance to make this exceptional property your new home. Contact us for viewings and further information.

title: Odyssey Orchid Residences
description:
Livv Housing Group are pleased to offer the opportunity to rent 2 bed upper floor flat (3rd floor) in a sheltered block in Halewood close to all amenities and motorway links.
Livv customers currently living in a 2 bed property who are not a priority band (Bands A.B & C), will not be considered for this property. Applicants need to be 55 years or over.
All Livv homes come with free enrolment into Experian Rental Exchange to help you gain a positive credit history.
Payment in advance of one weeks rent plus service charges will be required from all customers. This payment will be required irrespective of the customers entitlement to Housing Benefit or the Housing Element of Universal Credit.
In addition customers will be required to pay rent and service charges up to the point when your next payment date is scheduled, or the date your Direct Debit is set up. We will let you know how much you will need to pay when we call you to set up the tenancy.
If payment is not made before the tenancy is due to be signed then Livv will be unable to complete the process, the tenancy will not be granted, and the offer may be withdrawn.
Livv Housing Group review their rent annually in April.

title: Velvet Twilight Homes
description:
Detailed Description

Welcome to Baltic Yard - a contemporary rental development in the heart of the Baltic Triangle. Located just a 15-minute walk from Liverpool City Centre with a whole host of amenities on your doorstep.

Baltic Yard offers a new way of renting; an experience like no other. Not only do you get to live in a modern, luxurious apartment, you also get access to the resident gym, lounge, and communal terrace with far-reaching views over the city - all at no extra cost.

There's on-site, under-croft parking as well as a fantastic landscaped garden roof and podium terraces for residents to enjoy. Pets are allowed too, so you can really make Baltic Yard somewhere you can stay for years to come.

Renting doesn't mean saying goodbye to greenery. Come home to two spacious, living garden terraces. Not only this, but most of our apartments also have access to private balconies for you to enjoy.

The Apartments:
- Open plan living with fully integrated modern kitchen with Bosch integrated appliances, including washing machine and dishwasher
- Light and airy rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows
- Views across the city
- Modern bathroom suites with high quality fixtures and fittings and plenty of storage
- Evenly sized bedrooms with full height mirrored, fitted wardrobes and black-out blinds
- Oak effect flooring and quality carpets
- Ready to move into
- Our two-bedroom apartments are perfect for couples or sharers.

Drop us an email or call a friendly member of our team for more information or to book a viewing!

*at an additional monthly charge and subject to availability

Apartments at Baltic Yard fall within Council Tax Band B, C or D depending on the apartment. You can find out specific details on the gov website.

Standard tenancy length of 12 months. Enquire with our team if you are looking for a longer tenancy.

Baltic Yard offers a new way of renting; an experience like no other. Not only do you get to live in a modern, luxurious apartment, you also get access to the resident gym, lounge and communal terrace with far reaching views over the city - all at no extra cost.

There's on-site, under-croft parking as well as fantastic landscaped garden roof and podium terraces for residents to enjoy. Pets are allowed too, so you can really make Baltic Yard somewhere you can stay for years to come.

Renting doesn't mean saying goodbye to greenery. Come home to two spacious, living garden terraces. Not only this, but most of our apartments also have access to private balconies for you to enjoy.

The Apartments
- Open plan living with fully integrated modern kitchen with Bosch integrated appliances, including washing machine and dishwasher
- Light and airy rooms with floor to ceiling windows
- Views across the city
- Modern bathroom suites with high quality fixtures and fittings and plenty of storage
- Evenly sized bedrooms with full height mirrored, fitted wardrobes and black-out blinds
- Oak effect flooring and quality carpets
- Ready to move into
- Our two-bedroom apartments are perfect for couples or sharers.

Drop us an email or call a friendly member of our team for more information or to book a viewing!

*at an additional monthly charge and subject to availability

Apartments at Baltic Yard fall within Council Tax Band B, C or D depending on the apartment. You can find out specific details on the gov website.

Standard tenancy length of 12 months. Enquire with our team if you are looking for a longer tenancy.

* All content, imagery, and information contained in this listing are included for general marketing purposes only. They should not be relied on to provide an exact representation of the properties available. All photos and/or images used are for illustrative purposes; actual room layouts, sizes and colours may vary.

description:
Hunters are exited to bring to the market this 3 bedroomed family home on the cusp of Anfield and Tuebrook. The property has undergone a damp proof course and newly decorated throughout, including new kitchen cupboards. The ground floor boast a large through lounge through to the kitchen. There is an added bonus of a separate room which could be utilised as a a fourth bedroom, office etc.
The 3 bedrooms along with the fully tiled bathroom can be found on the first floor.

description:
A three bedroom property with front & rear gardens.

The property comprises of; entrance hallway, living/dining room, kitchen and a utility room. To the first floor are two double bedrooms, a single bedroom and a family bathroom. Externally, there is a driveway along with front and rear gardens.

This opportunity will not be on the market for long so contact us today to arrange your viewing!

title: Eclipse Haven Residences
description:
Located in the sought after dock area, this stunning apartment overlooks the Marina and the River Mersey. It has a fob entry, gated car park with 1 allocation and visitor parking is also available.

This impeccable apartment is available immediately.

Entrance to the apartment is via two communal, fob entry, doors leading to a communal hallway. The apartment is on the first floor and there is a lift.

The accommodation comprises a private hallway; large lounge with French doors opening to a Juliet balcony; a modern kitchen with all appliances; a master double bedroom with built in furniture and ensuite shower room; a second double bedroom with built in furniture; a modern white family bathroom with shower over a full sized bath.

The city centre and Albert Dock are within walking distance, as is the local train station.

This is truly a stunning apartment and must be seen to be appreciated. The property is let fully furnished, as shown in the photos and is exclusive of bills. All certificates supplied. Deposit £1250.00. We regret that pets are not accepted as it is restricted on the lease. None smokers only please.

title: Eternal Horizon Apartments
description:
Ideal for students and young professionals, this fully furnished one-bedroom apartment has everything you need and is just a stone’s throw from the University of Liverpool. Situated just outside the Georgian Quarter, and a few minutes outside of Toxteth, you have both the old historical and new up-and-coming areas to explore. With buses on your doorstep, it’s a 15-minute journey into town, where you can no doubt make the most of Liverpool’s fantastic shopping, music scene, and nightlife.

Available immediately, the apartment is generously proportioned with a double bed, bathroom with shower, desk perfect for studying, and a stylish compact kitchen complete with a dining space that can easily seat guests. With large floor to ceiling windows facing the entrance, the kitchen, and your desk, you have ample light where you need it the most. The bed, nicely secluded in the centre of the apartment with plenty of space either side, is comfortably tucked away allowing you to sleep in peace.

With its short distance to the university, neighbouring bus stops, and Edge Hill train station, you’ll be well connected and ready to make the most of living in Liverpool. If you’re interested in having a closer look, or have any questions, do get in touch.

*Available Now
address: Upper Parliament Street, Toxteth, Liverpool L8

title: Vista Verde Heights
description:
Looking for a modern pad to rent that’s out of the city but close enough for convenience? What about Tillerman Court, the former Police Station of Old Swan, that’s now home to a superb two-bedroom house!

This Victorian landmark and quirky conversion is a slick ground floor apartment, ideal for couples or individuals looking for a nice place to live that’s a convenient hot spot for all surrounding Liverpool areas.

With an open plan living area, you’ll find high ceilings, quality wooden flooring and large windows creating the perfect, bright room that’s the beating heart of the home. Kitchen wise, you’ll find the integrated appliances housed inside a modern design. The bedroom, double in size, also offers plenty of lighting and is based with a thick grey carpet for a premium feel. The bathroom emphasises all things modern, think stylish tiling, shiny appliances and a huge walk-in shower and glass screen. This property is unfurnished.

Private parking comes with this home in Tillerman Court, ideal for jumping straight onto the close by road networks, such as Edge Lane and the M62. Liverpool city centre is only a 15 minute drive away, so this property boasts an ideal location. Commuters, the frequent buses run straight past the apartment, and there’s several nearby train stations.

Boasting a great high street location, you’ll find an array of nearby shops from all the best of the chains including Tesco and Aldi, as well as local delights. There’s plenty of choices to eat and drink in style too, with pubs and restaurants surrounding the area.

Available 21st August 2023. Council Tax Band A. 12 month tenancy. Deposit £1,030.
address: Sandforth Court, Queens Drive, West Derby, Liverpool L13

title: Golden Oasis Residences
description:
Entwistle Green Lettings are pleased to offer to let this exceptional fully furnished, stunning, beach front home with unrivalled panoramic views from every room. Anthonly Gormley's statues â€ ̃Another Place' can be viewed from every room within the house!

This large, open plan property is luxurious throughout and perfectly combines the traditional exposed beams upstairs with the contemporary, large, open plan â€ ̃New England beach house' feel downstairs. White and cream throughout adds to the tastefully decorated, â€ ̃New England beach house' feel; and with its secluded position, away from hustle and bustle, it exudes an air of calm and tranquillity that enhances the stunning views from all the rooms.

It has been furnished to the highest specifications throughout; with an extremely large luxury kitchen with marble topped island/Neff fittings, Lutron sophisticated atmospheric mood lighting throughout, a large open plan living and dining area with underfloor heating and Lapicida limestone flooring. Every bedroom has either a Fired Earth or Porcelanosa tiled bathrooms -including the large downstairs shower room and WC.

Gable Cottage comprises; A charming gated courtyard that is of a generous size leading to the entrance to the property. The entrance hallway then opens onto two distinct living areas.

Firstly, a stylish, modern open plan kitchen/dining area with neff appliances and patio doors which lead onto an outside patio area and an extensive garden, with the beach and river as the backdrop. To the rear of the same room there is a spacious area for dining and entertaining.

Secondly, there is a separate generous lounge area with log burner, to retire to after dining, where you can relax and take in the views of the passing ships and cruise liners. This room also looks onto the garden, Wirral peninsular and Welsh hills beyond. Again, with access through patio doors to the outside with an area ideal for BBQs.

A bespoke and unique staircase leads upstairs to the hallway/landing with three generous double bedrooms, all with beautiful and large en suites/shower rooms. The enormous master bedroom has a bathroom that boasts a high end Fired earth bath, separate walk in shower and twin wash basins. Wake up to a view in bed from the Juliette glass balcony.

This luxury home benefits from gated driveway, large garage, utility room, CCTV, alarm and most importantly, the location this stunning property is situated in!

This property is available from September/October, being offered on a short term basis up to 6 months and is perfect for a family needing temporary accommodation, or a professional couple moving into the area.

Please call the office who will be happy to discuss viewing arrangements. Council Tax Band: F Holding Deposit: £1153.00

description:

Two-bedroom duplex apartment located on the top floor and boasting a large balcony. The property offers a fine array of stylish, high specification accommodation which in brief comprises: Entrance hall, Master bedroom with en-suite shower room, a further double bedroom and separate bathroom. description:

description:

Welcome to roco, James Street nestled in Liverpool's vibrant and bustling heart! Situated in one of the city's most sought-after locations, this beautiful building offers an exciting blend of urban living and cultural richness. Surrounded by an eclectic mix of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options, residents here will enjoy the best of both worlds – the convenience of city life and the charm of Liverpool's historic landmarks just a stone's throw away. With excellent transport links and a vibrant community, James Street is the perfect address for those seeking a dynamic and enriching lifestyle in the heart of Liverpool.

Indulge your senses in our stunning one-bedroom apartment at roco, where contemporary design and luxurious amenities create a feast for the eyes and a haven for the soul. The kitchen and dining area beckon with their bright, airy ambience, adorned with sleek integrated appliances, like a touch control ceramic induction hob and a combi oven, inviting you to savour culinary delights.

Relax in the living room, surrounded by plush furnishings, including a cosy three-seater sofa, as the soft glow of a Samsung 4K smart TV illuminates the space. Your master bedroom becomes an oasis of tranquillity, where a king-size bed awaits, accompanied by the soothing sounds of the Roberts Bluetooth speaker and ample storage in a double wardrobe and bedside stands.

Step into the bathroom, a sanctuary of modern elegance, featuring porcelain tiling, a spacious three-piece suite, a heated towel rail, and an LED mirrors, creating an exquisite sensory experience with every visit.

Embrace the allure of our one-bedroom apartment at Roco, where sight, touch, and sound come together to create an enchanting residential haven that soothes your senses and elevates your living experience to new heights.

Introducing roco's Unparalleled Amenities:

Discover a world of luxurious living at roco, where an array of exceptional amenities awaits you. Immerse yourself in a state-of-the-art Techno Gym and serene yoga room, designed to elevate your fitness and well-being. As you ascend to our rooftop, be captivated by the stunning views of the Three Graces while relaxing in our blissful hot tubs.*

Step into our Japanese-inspired roof garden, an oasis of tranquillity amidst the vibrant city. Find solace in our wellness room, a dedicated space for self-care and mindfulness. Experience movie magic in our private cinema room and conduct business with finesse in our elegant private boardroom.*

Fuel your creativity and productivity in our vibrant co-working spaces, fostering collaboration and innovation. Unwind and connect in our inviting resident lounges, where friendships flourish and memories are made.*

Lastly, indulge in intimate gatherings in our exquisite private dining and snug room, creating memories to cherish. At roco, we are committed to enhancing every aspect of your living experience.

Welcome to a world of unparalleled amenities, exclusively designed for you.

Exclusive rental offer **reserve in August and enjoy A £100 monthly discount on your rent**

We're thrilled to announce that this fantastic offer is here to stay! By reserving your apartment in August, you'll enjoy a £100 monthly discount on your rent throughout the entirety of your tenancy. It's the perfect way to add extra savings to your living experience, making your time at roco even more rewarding. Don't wait any longer, secure your dream apartment today and start enjoying the benefits of this ongoing special offer!

title: Eternal Moonrise Residences
description:
Description


Affitto Estate Agents are proud to present to the market this first floor executive apartment with high ceilings situated within the popular Tower Building development close to the River Mersey. The property benefits from being fully furnished to a high standard.
Contact us to arrange A viewing!
The property benefits from having a spacious open plan lounge/kitchen area, two large double bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The lounge/kitchen is of a large size and has a modern finish. The kitchen/lounge incorporates fitted wall and base units as well as an island which provides ample storage capacity. An electric hob and oven is included too, as well as an integrated fridge/freezer and a dishwasher.
The lounge offers a sofa, armchairs, a coffee table, TV stand as well as a dining table with chairs. All furnishing is of a high standard and good quality.
Both bedrooms are large doubles and benefit from an en-suite bathrooms one of which incorporates a full size bathtub as well as shower. Both rooms have double beds and two side tables, as well as wardrobes.
Some of the benefits include excellent views, access to lifts, 24 hour concierge & impressive spacious entrance lobby in building. Located on Water Street / The Strand & opposite the Three Graces & the River Mersey and only a short walk to the Albert Dock and Liverpool One Shopping Centre.
Viewing is highly recommended on this attractive apartment, so contact us today!

title: Solstice Serenity Suites
description:
Renting from Placefirst is the stress-free way to have a great new home. We are a multi-award winning, leading build-to-rent provider and professional landlord. Every home features modern, high specification kitchens and bathrooms, well-proportioned living spaces and great energy efficiency, in a well-maintained neighbourhood that we look after. We have designed and built each home exclusively for renters.

Each Placefirst neighbourhood has a dedicated resident services manager who is on hand to help. We also have in house maintenance and lettings teams, and we are committed to delivering the best possible customer experience for our residents.

Welcome to the Welsh Streets
An award-winning neighbourhood with something to suit everybody's style. A mix of 1 - 5 bed refurbished period properties and new build homes at the Welsh Streets. High spec and characterful homes with private and communal gardens in a great location.

Key features:
* High quality home
* Ensuite master bedroom
* Well-connected location
* Private gardens and communal green spaces
* High spec kitchens and bathrooms
* Downstairs WC
* Pet friendly
* On-street parking available
* Close to local amenities, shops, parks and transport
* Council tax band A

Location
Liverpool city centre, including the train station, is just 15 minutes away by bus - great for getting to work or having an evening in town.
There are 7 primary schools (2 Outstanding) and 3 secondary schools (1 Outstanding) within walking distance.
Close to supermarkets, shops, amenities and leisure facilities, including two well-managed parks close by, both with playgrounds and tennis courts.

Additional Information
- All homes at the Welsh Streets are for private rent direct with Placefirst.
- We offer customers 12-month tenancies which can be renewed each year with no charge.
- Placefirst are a pet friendly landlord, subject to conditions.

*Please note - Images are representative of the quality and finish, please arrange a viewing for the exact property type and layout.

Each Placefirst neighbourhood has a dedicated resident services manager who is on hand to help. We also have in house maintenance and lettings teams, and we are committed to delivering the best possible customer experience for our residents.

Welcome to the Welsh Streets
An award-winning neighbourhood with something to suit everybody's style. A mix of 1 - 5 bed refurbished period properties and new build homes at the Welsh Streets. High spec and characterful homes with private and communal gardens in a great location.

Key features:
* High quality home
* Ensuite master bedroom
* Well-connected location
* Private gardens and communal green spaces
* High spec kitchens and bathrooms
* Downstairs WC
* Pet friendly
* On-street parking available
* Close to local amenities, shops, parks and transport
* Council tax band A

Location
Liverpool city centre, including the train station, is just 15 minutes away by bus - great for getting to work or having an evening in town.
There are 7 primary schools (2 Outstanding) and 3 secondary schools (1 Outstanding) within walking distance.
Close to supermarkets, shops, amenities and leisure facilities, including two well-managed parks close by, both with playgrounds and tennis courts.

Additional Information
- All homes at the Welsh Streets are for private rent direct with Placefirst.
- We offer customers 12-month tenancies which can be renewed each year with no charge.
- Placefirst are a pet friendly landlord, subject to conditions.

title: Ethereal Echo Suites
description:
Welcome to Simple Life's Highfield Green homes. Highfield Green is situated within the well established, residential area of Tower Hill; an outlying district of Liverpool, located approximately 10 miles north east of Liverpool City Centre.

The Ellesmere is a stunning home built with your needs in mind. Downstairs, there is a generous living room, hallway and WC. The rear of the property has a magnificent living/kitchen area with a range of contemporary fitted units with integrated appliances. The room has French windows opening onto and overlooking the rear garden as well as a series of skylights which flood the room with light – an ideal space for both family time and entertaining.

Upstairs there is a spacious family bathroom complete with a bath and shower, a master bedroom with fitted, mirrored wardrobes and two further well-proportioned bedrooms. At the top of the stairs you will also find a handy store cupboard.

The rail station is located 1.3m from the site and offers links to Liverpool (35 mins) and Wigan (20 mins) the Town Centre has its own bus station operating services to a range of destinations in the local area and beyond.

Kirkby Leisure Centre, The David Lloyd Centre and the Liverpool fc Academy are all within minutes drive/walk. The area also boasts an abundance of local schools and a town centre with supermarkets and convenience stores.

Deposit: £1,065
Tenancy Length: 12 Months
Council Tax Band: C
Available 27th September 2023

Welcome to roco, James Street nestled in Liverpool's vibrant and bustling heart! Situated in one of the city's most sought-after locations, this beautiful building offers an exciting blend of urban living and cultural richness. Surrounded by an eclectic mix of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options, residents here will enjoy the best of both worlds – the convenience of city life and the charm of Liverpool's historic landmarks just a stone's throw away. With excellent transport links and a vibrant community, James Street is the perfect address for those seeking a dynamic and enriching lifestyle in the heart of Liverpool.

Indulge your senses in our stunning one-bedroom apartment at roco, where contemporary design and luxurious amenities create a feast for the eyes and a haven for the soul. The kitchen and dining area beckon with their bright, airy ambience, adorned with sleek integrated appliances, like a touch control ceramic induction hob and a combi oven, inviting you to savour culinary delights.

Relax in the living room, surrounded by plush furnishings, including a cosy three-seater sofa, as the soft glow of a Samsung 4K smart TV illuminates the space. Your master bedroom becomes an oasis of tranquillity, where a king-size bed awaits, accompanied by the soothing sounds of the Roberts Bluetooth speaker and ample storage in a double wardrobe and bedside stands.

Step into the bathroom, a sanctuary of modern elegance, featuring porcelain tiling, a spacious three-piece suite, a heated towel rail, and an LED mirrors, creating an exquisite sensory experience with every visit.

Embrace the allure of our one-bedroom apartment at Roco, where sight, touch, and sound come together to create an enchanting residential haven that soothes your senses and elevates your living experience to new heights.

Introducing roco's Unparalleled Amenities:

Discover a world of luxurious living at roco, where an array of exceptional amenities awaits you. Immerse yourself in a state-of-the-art Techno Gym and serene yoga room, designed to elevate your fitness and well-being. As you ascend to our rooftop, be captivated by the stunning views of the Three Graces while relaxing in our blissful hot tubs.*

Step into our Japanese-inspired roof garden, an oasis of tranquillity amidst the vibrant city. Find solace in our wellness room, a dedicated space for self-care and mindfulness. Experience movie magic in our private cinema room and conduct business with finesse in our elegant private boardroom.*

Fuel your creativity and productivity in our vibrant co-working spaces, fostering collaboration and innovation. Unwind and connect in our inviting resident lounges, where friendships flourish and memories are made.*

Lastly, indulge in intimate gatherings in our exquisite private dining and snug room, creating memories to cherish. At roco, we are committed to enhancing every aspect of your living experience.

Welcome to a world of unparalleled amenities, exclusively designed for you.

Exclusive rental offer **reserve in August and enjoy A £100 monthly discount on your rent**

We're thrilled to announce that this fantastic offer is here to stay! By reserving your apartment in August, you'll enjoy a £100 monthly discount on your rent throughout the entirety of your tenancy. It's the perfect way to add extra savings to your living experience, making your time at roco even more rewarding. Don't wait any longer, secure your dream apartment today and start enjoying the benefits of this ongoing special offer!

title: Lush Lavender Residences
description:
Description


Affitto Estate Agents are proud to present to the market this first floor executive apartment with high ceilings situated within the popular Tower Building development close to the River Mersey. The property benefits from being fully furnished to a high standard.
Contact us to arrange A viewing!
The property benefits from having a spacious open plan lounge/kitchen area, two large double bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The lounge/kitchen is of a large size and has a modern finish. The kitchen/lounge incorporates fitted wall and base units as well as an island which provides ample storage capacity. An electric hob and oven is included too, as well as an integrated fridge/freezer and a dishwasher.
The lounge offers a sofa, armchairs, a coffee table, TV stand as well as a dining table with chairs. All furnishing is of a high standard and good quality.
Both bedrooms are large doubles and benefit from an en-suite bathrooms one of which incorporates a full size bathtub as well as shower. Both rooms have double beds and two side tables, as well as wardrobes.
Some of the benefits include excellent views, access to lifts, 24 hour concierge & impressive spacious entrance lobby in building. Located on Water Street / The Strand & opposite the Three Graces & the River Mersey and only a short walk to the Albert Dock and Liverpool One Shopping Centre.
Viewing is highly recommended on this attractive apartment, so contact us today!

Deposit: £1,750
address: The Tower Building, 22 Water Street, Liverpool L3

title: Whispering Willow Suites
description:
Renting from Placefirst is the stress-free way to have a great new home. We are a multi-award winning, leading build-to-rent provider and professional landlord. Every home features modern, high specification kitchens and bathrooms, well-proportioned living spaces and great energy efficiency, in a well-maintained neighbourhood that we look after. We have designed and built each home exclusively for renters.

Each Placefirst neighbourhood has a dedicated resident services manager who is on hand to help. We also have in house maintenance and lettings teams, and we are committed to delivering the best possible customer experience for our residents.

Welcome to the Welsh Streets
An award-winning neighbourhood with something to suit everybody's style. A mix of 1 - 5 bed refurbished period properties and new build homes at the Welsh Streets. High spec and characterful homes with private and communal gardens in a great location.

Key features:
* High quality home
* Ensuite master bedroom
* Well-connected location
* Private gardens and communal green spaces
* High spec kitchens and bathrooms
* Downstairs WC
* Pet friendly
* On-street parking available
* Close to local amenities, shops, parks and transport
* Council tax band A

Location
Liverpool city centre, including the train station, is just 15 minutes away by bus - great for getting to work or having an evening in town.
There are 7 primary schools (2 Outstanding) and 3 secondary schools (1 Outstanding) within walking distance.
Close to supermarkets, shops, amenities and leisure facilities, including two well-managed parks close by, both with playgrounds and tennis courts.

Additional Information
- All homes at the Welsh Streets are for private rent direct with Placefirst.
- We offer customers 12-month tenancies which can be renewed each year with no charge.
- Placefirst are a pet friendly landlord, subject to conditions.

*Please note - Images are representative of the quality and finish, please arrange a viewing for the exact property type and layout.

title: Mystic Moonbeam Apartments
description:
Welcome to Simple Life's Highfield Green homes. Highfield Green is situated within the well established, residential area of Tower Hill; an outlying district of Liverpool, located approximately 10 miles north east of Liverpool City Centre.

The Ellesmere is a stunning home built with your needs in mind. Downstairs, there is a generous living room, hallway and WC. The rear of the property has a magnificent living/kitchen area with a range of contemporary fitted units with integrated appliances. The room has French windows opening onto and overlooking the rear garden as well as a series of skylights which flood the room with light – an ideal space for both family time and entertaining.

Upstairs there is a spacious family bathroom complete with a bath and shower, a master bedroom with fitted, mirrored wardrobes and two further well-proportioned bedrooms. At the top of the stairs you will also find a handy store cupboard.

The rail station is located 1.3m from the site and offers links to Liverpool (35 mins) and Wigan (20 mins) the Town Centre has its own bus station operating services to a range of destinations in the local area and beyond.

Kirkby Leisure Centre, The David Lloyd Centre and the Liverpool fc Academy are all within minutes drive/walk. The area also boasts an abundance of local schools and a town centre with supermarkets and convenience stores.

Deposit: £1,065
Tenancy Length: 12 Months
Council Tax Band: C

title: Ethereal Echo Residences
description:
Hunters are introducing this spectacular four-bedroom extended semi-detached family home of grand proportions to the market. The property, located on Cambrian Way, has recently undergone a comprehensive renovation. You enter the property via a porch, leading to an impressive and inviting hall. The ground floor boasts a spacious family lounge, an extended open-plan living area, and a bespoke kitchen and dining area with an exquisite Atrium-style glass roof and bi-folding doors that reveal a picturesque rear garden. Completing the ground floor is a convenient downstairs WC and utility room.
As you ascend to the first floor, the property continues to impress, showcasing three generously sized, immaculately presented double bedrooms, one of which offers en suite. There is also a luxurious family bathroom, featuring a free-standing plunge bath, a double vanity unit, and porcelain tiles on the walls and floor.
The pinnacle of the property is found on the second floor, where a fourth double bedroom awaits with an en suite bathroom. Externally, the property features off-road parking and a single garage with additional storage space at the front. At the rear, there is a substantial garden with a sunny aspect throughout the day. The property also boasts double glazing and gas central heating throughout, among other benefits.

title: Azure Ascent Apartments
description:
Discover urban living at its finest with this exquisite flat, exclusively brought to the market by Atlas Estate Agents. Nestled within the heart of Ellerman Road, City Centre, L3, this remarkable two-bedroom gem is now available to let, offering a harmonious blend of comfort and convenience.

Step into a world of contemporary elegance as you enter the bright and well-maintained foyer that sets the tone for the entire residence. Ascend to the second floor and be greeted by an impressive 55 square meters of thoughtfully arranged accommodation, all designed for seamless living.

The open plan kitchen and living area is a true centerpiece, featuring a modern kitchen that invites culinary exploration and a spacious living room bathed in natural light. The attractive contemporary decor throughout the apartment harmoniously combines style and functionality, making every corner a visual delight.

Retreat to the spacious master bedroom boasting a large fitted wardrobe, offering ample storage without compromising on aesthetics. The second bedroom presents a versatile space, perfect for guests or a home office, allowing you to tailor it to your desires.

Indulge in the modern bathroom, a sanctuary of relaxation after a long day, fitted with all the amenities to meet your needs. This well-presented apartment is part-furnished, making your move a breeze, and even comes with a secure allocated parking space, providing the utmost convenience.

Situated within the prestigious City Quay Development, you'll experience the best of urban living with easy access to the bustling city center. Stroll mere minutes to the breathtaking riverside and waterfront, where tranquility meets cityscape, offering a perfect blend of natural beauty and modern vibrancy.

Transport links are conveniently close by, ensuring easy commuting and connectivity. Embrace the lifestyle you've been longing for, where every facet of urban living meets luxury and comfort. Don't miss the opportunity to make this well-appointed apartment your next home. Contact Atlas Estate Agents today to arrange your viewing and seize the chance to live in this captivating urban haven.

title: Golden Grove Apartments
description:
Looking for a beautiful home with character features and plenty of space? We've got the place for you! Situated on Mornington Avenue in Crosby, this semi-detached home offers ample space with four bedrooms. The property, built in the 1930s, is beautifully presented and perfect for a family. Its convenient location provides proximity to local schools, shops, and transportation options.

Upon entering the home, you are greeted by an entrance hall featuring black and white floor tiles, stained glass windows, and a picture rail. To the left, there is a bright and spacious living room adorned with original floorboards, a large double glazed bay window, and an exquisite period fireplace. On the right, you'll find a family dining room with wood flooring, a picture rail, and a large feature window overlooking the garden. The split-level kitchen is equipped with modern appliances, a Belfast sink, and offers access to the rear garden.

Moving to the first floor, you'll discover three well-sized bedrooms, a family bathroom, and an en-suite in the master bedroom. On the second floor, a recently renovated loft space awaits, complete with skylights, two spacious alcoves, and ample storage options. The rear of the property boasts a generously sized fenced and enclosed garden, primarily laid to lawn with a patio area. Additionally, there is a levelled and paved strip of land at the back of the garden. Throughout the property, you'll benefit from double glazing, while art deco style features such as stained glass windows, decorative tiles, and plate rails add to its charm.

Viewing is a must to appreciate all this home has to offer!

title: Mystic Moonrise Suites
description:
Property Reference: 1784575.

Middle Floor Flat (Flat 2) description for open rent

Location

The road that this house is in is largely residential family homes, so quiet and attractive outlook, not much traffic comes down it, and the area is secure, it's about a 5 minute walk to Waterloo Rail Station with a 20 minute train into Liverpool centre, or 30 into Southpoty (shortly on the new Merseyrail trains..). It's approximately 3 minute walk to a bus stop again serving all merseyside locations. There's a large number of restaurants and public houses with a 5/10 minute walk. Access to open grassland and the beach and Marina Lake is less than 5 minutes.

The Flat

It's a very large flat circa 60 square metres, with spacious rooms, located on a middle floor via a staircase, accessed through a common front door, but with entirely self contained area which includes; bathroom, bedroom, living room and kitchen.

The following are currently in the flat:

Bathroom

- Includes a sink, toilet, shower cubicle and a separate bath (shower and bath served by hot water as opposed to a weak electric shower), one double glazed opening window for all year round ventilation

Bedroom

- Double bed, and fitted with clean bedding and pillows (not replaceable), variety of storage including double wardrobe, and white formica dressing tables, several mirrors, large bright windows fitted with heat retaining curtains and nets. A tumble dryer is also in this room, works until it breaks.

Living Room

- Large bright room with bay windows overlooking an attractive road, heat retaining curtains and nets fitted. Storage cabinet, large sofa and chair, dining table (good for home working), and some lighting provided. Electric fire, but unlikely cost effective as central heating radiator in lounge.

Kitchen

- Heating boiler (gas)

- Refrigerator

- Freezer

- Sink with hot and cold

- Electric Cooker with oven and hob

- Other devices and some crockery/cutlery and cooking utensils - enough to cook a meal on night one

- Cleaning cupboard for mop etc. Ironing board.

Overall:

- No admin fees

- Central heating fired from own boiler within the flat, tenant to take on the dual supply of gas and electricity or come to an agreement to pay for bills via the landlord based on units consumed and calculations agreed together, this calculation would also need to include the daily standard charges for both fuel types.

- Carpeted except kitchen.

- An official deposit scheme will be used for the deposit (one month)

- There is a fast broadband supply to the flat and the tenant would need to have this directly connected under their own name and pay for this separately.

- Tenant expected to keep flat clean, and not damage the hallway

- Minimum 6 month contract

- Single, landlord will meet prior to letting, at the property on a day suitable to both potential tenant and landlord, generally with a weeks notice.

- There is an off road parking area, that would be largely accessible for most of the time, but does not constitute part of the rental agreement

Whilst the flat is clean the furnishings and carpets do have wear and tear and whilst we've kept the walls painted when necessary the decoration is somewhat dated, but all functional, unbroken and functioning.

title: Azure Ascent Residences
description:
This is your chance to live in a prime waterfront location, right on Princes Dock in Liverpool. This iconic and imposing development has a range of 1 and 2-bedroom apartments available and is in an ideal location for students and commuters alike.

This apartment is absolutely spot-on. Inside you’ll find a bright open-plan kitchen/lounge/dining room with huge windows. The kitchen is super-sleek with wooden flooring, white cabinets, chrome handles and an integrated hob/oven. The bedroom is a very good size double with plush carpeting underfoot - the perfect haven to relax away from the hustle and bustle of the city - and the modern, tiled bathrooms are equally as luxurious.

A short stroll from your apartment takes you into the heart of Liverpool, where you’ll have more bars, restaurants, eateries and shops than you could shake a stick at. If you’d like to wander further afield, you have a huge range of transport links at your fingertips, along with easy access to the whole of Liverpool and beyond - you really couldn’t be more perfectly located. With a bus stop practically on your doorstep and James Street train station just a short stroll away, commuting is a breeze.

Properties like this tend to get snapped up quickly, so make sure you give are team a call if you fancy a closer look. And just so you know, the images are for marketing purposes only, so the fixtures and fittings may vary.

Milbank Quarter stands as the inaugural phase of the highly anticipated 9 Millbank development, masterminded by Berkley Homes. Seamlessly harmonizing the rich heritage of the Grade ii-listed 'Imperial Chemical House' from the 1920s with a meticulously crafted contemporary quarter, this architectural marvel provides an exclusive haven of modern living for its discerning inhabitants.

The development is enriched by a host of exquisite leisure amenities, ensuring the utmost luxury and convenience for its residents. A round-the-clock concierge service, a lavish pool, a rejuvenating spa, a private cinema, well-appointed meeting rooms, and a serene garden retreat collectively elevate the living experience to unprecedented heights.

title: Vista Verde Heights
description:
The Hackney Accommodation

Lon-480132

Homelike is an online booking platform for furnished apartments for short to long stays. All bills and utilities are included in the monthly price Viewings are not available for most properties as our booking process is 100% online. When inquiring about a property, please quote the property reference number above.

A modern collection of apartments located in the heart of Hackney in North London, just a short walk from the centre of Hackney in a very well-connected part of London, that is perfect for commuters looking to travel into the city for work.

The apartments are located in a quieter neighbourhood that is close to the centre of Hackney and are ideal for anyone looking to escape the noisy and busy streets of Central London. The Apartments are modern, spacious and offer plenty of room to relax and move about at home.

All apartments are tastefully furnished with a fully equipped modern kitchen (oven, microwave, refrigerator etc.) a dining area next to the lounge, a washing machine, a smart TV in the living room and fully installed Wi-Fi.

Each apartment contains a large bedroom with a double bed and additional sleeping options in the lounge. All bed linen is 100% cotton and duvets and pillows are hypoallergenic. There is one main bathroom equipped with a bath/shower and toilet, which comes with bathroom products such as shampoo, shower gel and toilet roll.

Notice: Displayed prices and data are not final, and should be used for informative purpose only. They are not contractual or binding.

Energy pass
This building is not subject to EnEV.
Tenants use our platform to avoid apartment viewing queues and to book desired flat within minutes. After you request more details, we will send you booking instructions by email.

Area

Hackney Central is the main Overground station closest to the apartments for faster travel around the city. The fastest connection to the city centre is travelling West on The overground to Highbury & Islington to change to the Victoria line, London’s fastest underground service.

Standard railway connections (including trains to airports) are best made travelling south on the Overground to Stratford international, for faster train connections across London. Good bus services are running through Hackney throughout the day into the city centre along with a night bus (N242) that offers at least one alternative to taking a cab home after a few late drinks in the city centre!

For anyone wishing to drive into the centre of London, Hackney is outside the congestion charge zone but you will have to pay the daily charge of £15 per day, to drive into the more central areas such as Westminster.

Places of Interest:
Well Street Pizza Hackney - (9 minute walk)
La Mela - (10 minute walk)
Barnabas Road - (2 minute walk)

About The Building

Sip coffee on Makefield Road. Or pints in grain-to-can breweries. Walk along the buzzing High Road or follow trails across wild marshes. Hop on a train and you’ll be in central London in 15. You’re spoiled for transport connections. Within a three-minute walk of the front door, reach Tottenham Hale railway station, underground (Victoria line) and bus stops along Watermead Way.

The Gessner is a building that offers considered design to set the scene for your home. From the rooftop gardens with views of the city to curated art-lined walls that make a statement. There’s space to meet neighbours over a drink, or settle in for dinner and a movie at yours.

The Location

The Gessner overlooks the stunning Walthamstow Wetlands, a nature reserve covering a vast area of Thames Water reservoir as well as the open green space of Down Lane Park. There is access to miles of open space with Lee Valley on the doorstep. Walk or even cycle down the River Lea and canals all the way past Stoke Newington and Shoreditch up to the financial district of the city. There are also some superb cafes, restaurants and bars in close proximity as well as being conveniently close to a retail park and large supermarkets.

Public Transport

Situated moments away from Tottenham Hale Station (Underground Victoria Line Zone 3) with its additional Stansted Express Link and bus routes. The direct tube and rail links get you to King’s Cross in only 12 minutes, West End in 15 minutes and Liverpool Street in 20 minutes, as well as bus routes direct into Central London.

title: Twilight Terrace Lofts
description:
This superb and clean furnished apartment is ideal for working professionals / couples commuting to London Victoria, Blackfriars, City Thameslink, Farringdon and London Bridge stations. Modern second floor flat; located just a few minutes walk away from Bromley South`s newly built St Marks Square and Bromley South Station, which offers direct links into Central London.

The flat is ideal for working professionals / couples commuting to and from London Victoria, Blackfriars, City Thameslink, Farringdon and London Bridge stations. Property features Clean, bright and recently fitted gas central heating and thermostat. Carpeted with double glazed windows throughout with plenty of storage space. Off street parking. Communal gardens and well lit communal areas. Entry phone system. Nested within green areas and benefiting from parks nearby. Lounge Large living space with a Juliet balcony overlooking the communal gardens. Dining table and chairs. A sofa bed for overnight guests. Bedroom Double bedroom with double bed and mattress. Wall to wall fitted wardrobes and large chest of drawers. Blackout curtains. Kitchen Integrated appliances including gas hob, electric oven, dishwasher and washing machine. Tiled flooring. Fitted cupboards. Bathroom Modern bathroom with fitted storage. Bath and recently refurbished shower unit. Heated trail rail and shaving power point Tiled flooring.


Bills


Council Tax
Gas: Payg meter with monthly cost subject to consumption
Electricity: Normal meter with monthly cost subject to consumption
Water: Normal meter with monthly cost subject to consumption
Wi-Fi: Not included

transport highlights The property is within walking distance to Bromley South, Shortlands and Bromley North rail stations. Door to door distances from the property are : Bromley South 0.5 miles Shortlands 0.8 miles Bromley North 1 mile From Bromley South trains to London Victoria station is just about 15 minutes offering links to Victoria, District and Circle underground lines via London Victoria trains to City Thameslink and beyond, provide links to Northern and Bakerloo lines via Elephant and Castle, Jubilee line via London Bridge and London Overground via Denmark Hill stations. From Bromley North shuttle trains to Grove Park enable onward connections to Charring Cross and Cannon Street stations. Local bus routes serve Croydon(119), Crystal Palace(227), Orpington(61) and Lewisham(208). Night buses run to Oxford Circus(N3) and to Trafalgar Square(N47). Tramlines connects Bromley with Croydon and Wimbledon. Bromley also offers more than 100 miles of cycle routes, some off-route through Jubilee Park and along Waterlink Way.

Other useful information The property is within five to ten minutes walking distance from the following facilities: Bromley Churchill Theatre which often plays host to regular national tours. Bromley Central Reference Library which is the biggest of the 14 libraries that exist within the London Borough of Bromley. The High Street is very popular with its open air market and pedestrianised zone on Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays. Included in the shopping area also is The Glades, an indoor shopping centre with extensive car parking. Bromley South Central`s new development St Mark`s Square which provide a hotel, 9 screen multiplex cinema (Bromley Vue) popular restaurants and cafes. Waitrose, Marks and Spencer, Tesco, Salisbury`s superstores are all within walking distance from the property. Bromley includes Kent Downs making it the only London borough to include an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. Charles Darwin lived in Bromley.

* Superb furnished apartment - available almost immediately * One bedroom spacious apartment with lounge & dining area * Fully fitted integrated kitchen with crockery, cutlery & glasses * Delightful bathroom with window & shower over the bath * Recently installed central heating & double-glazed windows.

Viewing is highly recommended at your earliest convenience.

title: Celestial Cascade Homes
description:
A bright, airy, spacious three bedroom, three bathroom penthouse with rooftop views across London.
The exclusive direct access lift opens into a spacious entrance hall leading to a large open plan reception and dining area, perfect for entertaining on a large scale or for family movie nights. A large, bright kitchen with breakfast table is fully equipped with a 5 ring gas hob, double oven and plenty of cupboard space.
The large master bedroom suite comprises two dressing room areas, both with ample storage, as well as a luxurious ensuite bathroom.
The second bedroom can be made into either two single beds or one super-king size bed and benefits from good wardrobe space and an ensuite shower room. The third bedroom has a built-in desk and can be used as a study.
There is a third cloakroom/shower and separate utility room with washer and dryer.
The terrace, which runs along the side of the building and can be accessed from all three bedrooms giving uninterrupted views over London, from the spire of Westminster Cathedral in Victoria round to the famous redeveloped Battersea Power Station towers.
Bespoke design and modern details include Sonos surround sound throughout.
Newly installed double glazed windows and a Banham intruder alarm system.
This building (with live-in caretaker) is a quiet residential block perfectly located with Sloane Square tube only a moment away and the busy station of Victoria within walking distance.
Private parking available.

description: A first floor Victorian conversion flat in a prime road in Teddington close to all of the amenities of the High Street, Gas central heating and non restrictive parking on street. Shared garden with private shed. Available mid June 2022.

description: Completely refurbished throughout this property is available immediately and has off street parking. Close to the amenities and transport of Teddington, Hampton Hill and easy access to Kingston Town Centre with its array of shops and restaurants.

description:

title: Elysian Enclave Homes
description:
Situated within the renowned One Tower Bridge Riverside development, this opulent apartment benefits from a high-standard finish with a sophisticated interior design and is offered on a furnished and managed basis.

Featuring the latest in home automation technology with electronic blinds, climate control, and a touchscreen central control panel, the apartment comprises a large reception area with floor-to-ceiling windows. An open-plan fitted kitchen with fully integrated appliances. The master bedroom features fully fitted wardrobes with integrated drawers and shelving.

Residents at One Tower Bridge enjoy exceptional resident amenities inclusive of a dedicated concierge, state-of-the-art gym, pool and spa, business lounge, and virtual golfing range.

Located on the Southbank of the Thames adjacent to The City. The property sits within a short walk of London Bridge station (Northern, Jubilee lines, and mainline rail network) and within walking distance of The City.

title: Crimson Crest Residences
description:
Luxury two bedroom, two bathroom apartment set within South Quay Plaza's landmark dockside tower, a short walk away from amenities of Canary Wharf. Spacious and light, the open-plan kitchen/ living area features dual-aspect views, a generous sized master bedroom with an en suite shower, a further double bedroom and a family bathroom. Features include extensive glazing, underfloor heating, comfort cooling, lightwood engineered flooring, high-quality integrated kitchen appliances, a porcelain tiled bathroom, fibre optic infrastructure and home automation for controlling heating and lighting.

Residents have access to 24-hour concierge, exclusive residents only facilities include a 20m swimming pool set in a double height space, a thermal suite including hot pool, sauna and steam room, and a fully equipped gymnasium in addition to spa treatment rooms. Residents will also have exclusive access to the remarkable Residents' Club Lounge with bar facilities, board rooms, a screening room and London's highest communal roof garden providing some of the finest views of London. South Quay DLR station is a stone's throw from the apartment. Just a short walk away is Canary Wharf Underground Station (Jubilee line) and further through the shopping centre of E14 is access to the high-speed Crossrail service (Elizabeth line).

Deposit: Equivalent to 5 weeks' rent
Council: Tower Hamlets - Tax Band F

title: Emberwood Escape Suites
description:
Available August. Spacious & well positioned apartment boasting 532 sqft plus a expansive terraceloocated in Queen's Park, NW6.

Each apartment at The Avenue has been thoughtfully designed to the finest detail. The carefully considered specification creates a beautifully crafted home with elegant finishes. Beautifully presented interiors provide the perfect backdrop to your home. Sleek kitchen units and worktops come together with the oak flooring to provide a stylish look. The chrome bathroom fittings and contemporary sanitary ware work in perfect harmony with the elegant bathroom tiles

Located between Queen’s Park and leafy West Hampstead, in the North West of London, The Avenue is surrounded by iconic neighbourhoods. Indulge in a relaxing Sunday brunch at one of the quaint cafes, or try the handmade breads and vintage chesses at the farmers market near Queen’s Park.

The Avenue by Regal London offers a brand new spacious development in Queen’s Park, one of London’s most connected leafy neighbourhoods, close to independent shops, restaurants and local Farmers’ Market. These beautifully designed homes are within walking distance of three stations, meaning Central London is just minutes away.

There are two large double bedrooms, one having en-suite bathroom with exceptional balcony views. The kitchen/ reception area is open plan and beautifully presented with brand new furniture, L-shaped sofas and a Samsung TV is provided. The property also benefits from a large terrace/balcony which wraps around the whole property.

Ability Place includes a 24 hour concierge, leisure facilities and secure parking, which is inclusive of the price and is a stone-throw away from South quay DLR and Canary Wharf underground station.

Furnished to a high standard, the modern decor gives an extra lavish feel for the discerning individual. With extravagant views of the Wharf and dock, the wrap-around balcony/terrace gives exclusive panoramic views of London. The property has generous living space with ample storage within the corridor.

The property is available mid August and viewings are highly recommended.

The property is bright and spacious and the interiors are modern, stylish and functional with full length floor to ceiling windows in every room and oiled oak floors.

Island House is a gated community, with beautifully kept communal areas including a podium with furniture. The property is surrounded by an oasis of tranquillity yet is simply 5 minutes away from the action.

The development is surrounded by Canals. Walk along Lee canal which will take you to the Olympic Park in 15 mins.
Bromley by Bow underground is a 5 min walk (District line). From here one stop back (West Ham) takes you to the Jubliee line and from there one stop to Olympic stadium.
One stop forward to Mile end and you are on the Central Line which also goes to City & Central London. A large Tesco is within 3 min's walk

Situated in Prime Central London, South Kensington and Chelsea are exquisite areas of London and home to the social elite. The area contains a plethora of London's finest eateries/restaurants, boutique shopping on the infamous King’s Road as well as art galleries and luxury hotels. Chelsea itself is a premier international location, which benefits from its close proximity to the West End, is in easy reach of the City of London and Canary Wharf. South Kensington is also famed for Hyde Park where you can walk, run, go horse riding or boating on the large Serpentine Lake. In addition, South Kensington and Chelsea are considered by many as London's cultural centrepiece, with The Natural History Museum and The Victoria and Albert Museum close by.

title: Azure Ascend Homes
description:
Discover the pinnacle of luxury living at 1 Merino Gardens, where sophistication meets comfort in this remarkable 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment situated on the 10th floor. This residence goes beyond the ordinary, offering bespoke Italian furniture, two private balconies, and breathtaking views, all within the coveted E1W postcode.

Upon entering, you'll be immediately captivated by the seamless fusion of modern design and timeless elegance. The open-concept living space effortlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas, creating an inviting ambiance flooded with natural light. The bespoke Italian furnishings throughout the apartment add an element of artistry and refinement to every corner.

The living room is a sanctuary of relaxation, thoughtfully furnished to provide both comfort and style. The dining area, an extension of the living space, sets the stage for unforgettable gatherings and shared moments. The kitchen stands as a testament to culinary excellence, featuring top-tier Italian appliances, sleek cabinetry, and an expansive layout that caters to both form and function.

The primary bedroom is a true retreat, complete with an en-suite bathroom and direct access to one of the two private balconies. Wake up to panoramic vistas and indulge in the luxurious surroundings. The en-suite bathroom is a spa-like haven, boasting modern fixtures, a lavish bathtub, and meticulous attention to detail.

The second bedroom is designed with versatility in mind, offering ample space for various purposes, whether it's a guest room, a home office, or a creative studio. An adjacent full bathroom ensures convenience and privacy for both residents and visitors.

Step out onto the dual balconies to experience the ultimate blend of indoor-outdoor living. Adorned with upscale furnishings, these balconies provide an enchanting setting to soak in the stunning cityscape views, entertain guests, or simply savor moments of tranquility while overlooking the dynamic city below.

Living at 1 Merino Gardens grants you access to an array of amenities, including a fitness center, communal lounges, and the attentive services of a 24/7 concierge. The location is an urban dweller's dream, offering proximity to lush parks, trendy shopping districts, charming cafes, and cultural hotspots that London has to offer.

In summary, this 2-bed, 2-bath apartment on the 10th floor of 1 Merino Gardens redefines upscale living. With its bespoke Italian furniture, dual balconies, and prime location, it presents an unparalleled opportunity to elevate your lifestyle. Seize the chance to make this extraordinary apartment your home. Reach out today to schedule a private viewing and immerse yourself in the world of refined living. The property comprises own entrance, double living room on ground floor with floor to ceiling west facing doors out to terrace, stairs lead down to fantastic eat in fully fitted kitchen/dining room with separate WC glass doors out to secluded west facing garden. Stairs then lead down to basement level comprising impressive additional living space/ movie room, two double guest bedrooms both with en suite shower rooms. The master bedroom, dressing room and stunning en suite bathroom with free standing tub and walk in shower, dominates the entire first floor with wonderful through light and floor to ceiling sash windows. Two further double bedrooms are located on second and third floors both with own dressing areas an en suite bathroom. The house is offered unfurnished or can be furnished by separate negotiation. Viewings are highly recommended.

Location: Courtnell Street is a peaceful, pretty, tree lined street in Notting Hill's ever popular 'Artesian Village', perfectly positioned one street away from Ledbury Road and a moment's walk from the boutiques and restaurants of Westbourne Grove.

Added benefits include neutral carpets, decorated throughout, good space and great storage space in hallway. Located on Hornton Street close to all amenities of Kensington High Street, Kensington Church Street, Notting Hill and within walking distance to High Street Kensington underground station.

title: Harmony Harbor Suites
description:
A spacious home, situated in a popular location on Lordship Lane near Dulwich Village. Spanning over three floors is this stunning family home. Offered to the market either furnished or unfurnished, the property comprises a fully fitted separate kitchen, complete with built in appliances and ample storage and counter space. The rear of the property comprises a spacious open-plan kitchen diner with doors leading out to a spacious patio garden to rear. The first floor comprises two double bedrooms and a family bathroom and the top floor comprises a large double bedroom with en-suite shower and separate walk in wardrobe/ study. The location offers easy access to the shops, bars and restaurants on Lordship Lane and Dulwich Village. Transport links are provided via East Dulwich station for direct links to London Bridge, or Forest Hill for the East London Line. School catchments are in abundance, with Heber and Harris to name a couple.

Council Tax Band E
address: Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, London SE22

title: Mystic Moonbeam Apartments
description:
***No Deposit Available*** An impressive four bedroom terraced house, this lovely family home has been skilfully extended with loft and rear extensions and offers stylish interiors over three floors.

The ground floor offers a good sense of flowing space. The bright front reception room oozes character with its large bay window, original features and fireplace. There’s a 16ft wide middle reception room with fireplace which leads through to a kitchen/family room with island and bi- folding doors opening out to the garden. A cloakroom concludes the ground floor accommodation.

On the first floor there are two double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a single bedroom and family bathroom. The second floor (loft conversion) accommodates a main bedroom with ample fitted wardrobes, deep eves storage and en-suite shower room. Outside there’s a suntrap 30ft deep westerly aspect garden.

What we suspect will tempt parents most, however, is that this home falls in the catchment area for North Ealing primary school. The property is well placed for prestigious private schools including St Benedict’s and Notting Hill & Ealing High, St Augustine’s Priory, Harvington and Durston House. The bus routes along Pitshanger Lane will bring you into Ealing Town Centre where Ealing Broadway Crossrail station offers Elizabeth Line, District and Central line underground connections as well as overground links to Paddington and Heathrow.

The property is set within the desirable Ferry Quays development in Brentford. This development connects to the Thames Path and residents have access to concierge services, communal gardens and a selection of cafes and restaurants within the development. The property is also only moments away from the High Street which hosts a further range of shopping and dining opportunities. Commuters can take advantage of proximity to Brentford Mainline station, bus routes and the A4/M4 for transport links towards both Central London and Heathrow.

title: Urban Oasis Apartments
description:
Normie are delighted to offer this spacious and stunning three-bedroom semi-detached property, situated in the charming Prestwich Village. This property boasts a convenient location, with easy access to various shops, bars, and restaurants just a short walk away. The house is meticulously maintained and ready to move into, making it an ideal choice for a comfortable residence. It is situated on the desirable Highfield Road, occupying a sought-after position on a generously sized plot.

Upon entering, you'll find a porch leading to an entrance hallway. The ground floor features a guest WC, a well-lit and airy lounge with a bay windows to the front, and a second reception room that serves as an expansive dining area. The kitchen is tastefully designed and leads to an integral garage, which includes a utility section complete with a sink, washing machine, and fridge.

Moving to the first floor, you'll discover three well-proportioned bedrooms, all equipped with fitted wardrobes or bedroom furniture for efficient storage. Additionally, there's a modern three-piece bathroom offering contemporary amenities.

Externally, the property offers a fantastic driveway at the front, providing convenient off-road parking, along with a laid-to-lawn garden. The side and rear of the property boast a generously sized patio area and another laid-to-lawn garden. An outbuilding with power and lighting is included, offering valuable storage space for items like power tools.

This property truly reflects the care and attention of its owners, presenting itself in impeccable walk-in condition. It is available for immediate occupancy.

title: Elysian Shores Residences
description:
Detailed Description

Botanica is a collection of apartments, duplexes and townhouses that are like no other in Manchester. Ideally located, with exceptional amenities, these homes are perfect for solo residents, couples, families and sharers alike. Rooms are perfectly proportioned and well-designed with large windows and hi-spec fixtures and fittings. All residents benefit from exclusive access to onsite amenities.

One of Botanica’s highlights is its surrounding green space. Perfect for socialising, relaxing or even for outdoor events, our landscaped gardens have something for everyone. We’ve got BBQs and outdoor kitchens providing you with all you need to entertain friends!

Our exclusive Residents Lounge is perfect for work and play. It’s suitable for working from home and catching up with friends. This chill-out area is the perfect hub - with superfast Wi-Fi, large TV and complementary tea and coffee-making facilities on tap.

Whether it’s leg day or cardio, yoga or Pilates: We’ve got you covered. Leave your worries behind or channel them into a great workout in our fully-equipped onsite gym and wellness zone. Available to use free of charge, this space is designed to let you work out however you want.

Our onsite team is here to help. So, whether you need help arranging maintenance or recommendations of the best places to eat in town, it’s nice to know they’re there. We also have a resident app to make life simple.

Worried about missing a delivery? No problem, we’ve got it all wrapped up. Our on-site team will spare you a trip to the depot and save you the hassle of re-arranging delivery with a dependable postal collection point.

There’s on-site parking which is a real plus in the city and some properties even have their own driveways and there’s plenty of bike storage at no extra cost. As well as our fantastically landscaped garden space for residents to enjoy and pets are welcome too.

*not all apartments benefit from balconies

*at an additional monthly charge

Apartments at Botanica fall within Council Tax Band C or D depending on the apartment. You can find out specific details on the gov website.

Standard tenancy length of 12 months. Enquire with our team if you are looking for a longer tenancy.

* All content, imagery and information contained in this listing are included for general marketing purposes only. They should not be relied on to provide an exact representation of the properties available. All photos and/or images used are for illustrative purposes; actual room layouts, sizes and colours may vary.

title: Solstice Sunlight Lofts
description:
A beautifully presented corner apartment on the 5th floor of one of the most recent mill conversions in Manchester City Centre. With bright and airy accommodation the apartment offers spacious living accommodation with an abundance of period features throughout including exposed brick work, wood framed arched windows, high ceilings and original wall tiling. Part of Ancoats Urban Village, Royal Mills is a sought after development located alongside the Rochdale Canal and is within a stones throw of the Northern Quarter and Piccadilly Basin. The accommodation comprises; entrance hallway, open plan living room/kitchen with separate study area, two double bedrooms, the master with en en-suite and a main bathroom. The apartment comes complete with an allocated car parking space.

Development - Paragon Mill built in 1912 at eight storeys high was the world's tallest cast iron structure when it was built. It is the final mill conversion phase of the popular Royal Mills Development, a mixture of mill conversions and new build 1,2 and 3 bed apartments. This apartment is within the Victorian Mill Conversion and has many features throughout typical of this kind of property. Royal Mills is situated within Ancoats Urban Village, a canal side area undergoing regeneration and is a stones throw from the Northern Quarter and Piccadilly Station.

Communal Areas - Accessed via secure entry system the communal entrance area has many features that are so appealing with mill conversions, stone flooring, exposed brick work, exposed steel pillars. There is a lift to all floors.

Entrance Hallway - Accessed via hardwood front door with engineered oak flooring, storage cupboard housing hot water cylinder and washing machine, wall mounted electric heater. The entrance hallway is spacious and there is additional space for further freestanding storage if required.

Open Plan Living Room/Kitchen - 6.69m x 5.07m (21'11" x 16'8") - A fantastic living room with high ceilings and exposed brick work, large double glazed arch windows to the rear and side elevations incorporating a Juliet balcony allowing for a great deal of natural light into the apartment, oak engineered wood flooring, TV point, telephone point, space for dining table, 4 electric wall mounted heaters. The kitchen is fitted with a modern range of base and wall units with work surfaces over and splash backs, integrated Bosch electric double oven and microwave, touch control 4 ring ceramic hob and extractor hood, integrated Bosch fridge/freezer, dishwasher and wine cooler, 1 1⁄2 bowl sink and drainer unit, recessed ceiling down lighters.

Study - 1.73m x 1.65m (5'8" x 5'5") - Accessed from the living room with two double glazed windows offering duel aspects across the Ancoats roof tops, with solid oak flooring and original tiled and exposed brick walls. A great additional space.

Bedroom One - 3.62m x 3.09m plus door opening space (11'11" x 10 - A good sized master bedroom with double glazed arched window to the rear elevation, TV point, telephone point, wall mounted electric heater and space for free standing furniture. Door to:-

En-Suite Shower Room - 2.40m x 1.14m (7'10" x 3'9") - Fitted with a contemporary Villeroy and Boch three piece suite comprising WC, wash hand basin, enclosed shower cubicle, tiled walls and flooring, wall mounted heated towel rail, recessed ceiling down lighters, wall mounted mirror, wall mounted heated ladder towel rail.

Bedroom Two - 4.55 x 2.73m (14'11" x 8'11") - A second double bedroom with double glazed arched window to the side elevation, feature cast iron column, TV point, wall mounted electric heater.

Bathroom - 2.43 x 1.68 (8'0" x 5'6") - Again fitted with a contemporary Villeroy and Boch three piece suite comprising WC, wash hand basin, panelled bath with rain shower attachments over, tiled walls and flooring, wall mounted heated towel rail, recessed ceiling down lighters, wall mounted mirror, wall mounted heated ladder towel rail, feature cast iron column.

Parking - There is an allocated in the secure car park at the Royal Mills Development.

Notice
All photographs are provided for guidance only.

Client Money Protection provided by: Client Money Protect (cmp) (CMP003154)

title: Crimson Twilight Lofts
description:
Designed with the spirit of the Victorians in mind, New Vic is a pioneering way of renting where your every need is catered for by a dedicated onsite team. Carefully curated communal spaces mix the modern and preloved. You’ll find greenery flourishing amongst luxurious decor in areas such as the piano lounge, cinema, games room and more.

For the industrious, there are meeting rooms, zoom booths and free ultra-fast broadband whilst our more active residents will be more than satisfied by large, state of the art on-site gym and regular fitness classes.

New Vic is ideally situated adjacent to Victoria Station and just a short walk from the uber-hip Northern Quarter, with its buzzing café scene, vibrant bars and restaurants and independent shops.

There are a variety of one, two and three bedroom apartments available with furnished or unfurnished (and pet-friendly!) options, to suit your style of living.

Be the envy of your peers - be the New Victorian.
