You must attend a viewing of the property before you can make an offer to rent the property. Viewing the property and making an offer does not guarantee you will be successful in renting the property. Viewings are booked on a first come first served basis.

To make an offer for this property and to ensure the applicant is eligible, the applicant should meet the following affordability benchmark, this will ensure they meet the landlords expectations and pass through our referencing procedure. The applicant must be in full time employment, have been in their current role for more than 3 months and earning a minimum salary of £37,800 per year. If there are multiple applicants, the total, combined, yearly salaries must be at least this amount. If the applicant does not meet these requirements, they must provide a UK guarantor. To ensure the guarantor is eligible, the guarantor must be in full time employment, have been in their current role for more than 3 months and earning a minimum salary of £37,800 per year. If the applicant can't provide a suitable guarantor, the only option is to pay the full rental term in advance, for example, 6 months or 12 months' rent in advance.

If you have viewed the property, made an offer and the landlord has accepted, you will then be invited to reserve the property. To reserve a property, a holding fee, equivalent to one weeks rent is required, the holding fee will then contribute towards your first month's rent.

The tenant is responsible for all utilities, council tax, broadband and TV license. Bills are not included.

There are two deposit options, the tenant can pay a traditional deposit equivalent to 5 weeks Rent or a Zero Deposit option is available, for more information visit

Unfortunately the landlord does not allow pets in this property.

This apartment presents two spacious bedrooms, a contemporary bathroom, a modern designed open plan living kitchen, fully fitted with Electric Oven, Electric Hob, integrated Dishwasher, Washer / Dryer and Fridge Freezer.

description:

Granite Lettings & Property Management are pleased to present this large two bedroom, two bathroom apartment in Tiber Place, located in the heart of Manchester's Northern Quarter District. You must attend a viewing of the property before you can make an offer to rent the property. Viewing the property and making an offer does not guarantee you will be successful in renting the property. Viewings are booked on a first come first served basis.

To make an offer for this property and to ensure the applicant is eligible, the applicant should meet the following affordability benchmark, this will ensure they meet the landlords expectations and pass through our referencing procedure. The applicant must be in full time employment, have been in their current role for more than 3 months and earning a minimum salary of £53,820 per year. If there are multiple applicants, the total, combined, yearly salaries must be at least this amount. If the applicant does not meet these requirements, they must provide a UK guarantor. To ensure the guarantor is eligible, the guarantor must be in full time employment, have been in their current role for more than 3 months and earning a minimum salary of £53,820 per year. If the applicant can't provide a suitable guarantor, the only option is to pay the full rental term in advance, for example, 6 months or 12 months' rent in advance.

If you have viewed the property, made an offer and the landlord has accepted, you will then be invited to reserve the property. To reserve a property, a holding fee, equivalent to one weeks rent is required, the holding fee will then contribute towards your first month's rent.

The tenant is responsible for all utilities, council tax, broadband and TV license. Bills are not included.

There are two deposit options, the tenant can pay a traditional deposit equivalent to 5 weeks Rent or a Zero Deposit option is available, for more information visit

Unfortunately the landlord does not allow pets in this property.

title: Silver Stream Homes
description:
This furnished one double bedroom apartment is located in the East Tower on the 44th Floor in Deansgate Square with breath-taking south facing views and floor to ceiling windows providing an abundance of natural lighting and unique ventilation via the integrated window grill. The property comprises of entry hallway with an utility storage cupboard with washing machine, open plan living / dining, modern kitchen with Neff fitted kitchen appliances, coffee machine and wine cooler, a carpeted double bedroom with wardrobe storage and a main 3 piece Duravit bathroom with the option of a rain shower.

Julie Twist Properties welcomes to the market this opportunity to live in the much sought after luxury Deansgate Square development in Manchester City Centre. This furnished one double bedroom apartment is located in the East Tower on the 44th Floor with breath-taking south facing views and floor to ceiling windows providing an abundance of natural lighting and unique ventilation via the integrated window grill.

The property itself comprises of entry hallway with an utility storage cupboard with washing machine, open plan living / dining, modern kitchen with Neff fitted kitchen appliances, coffee machine and wine cooler, a carpeted double bedroom with wardrobe storage and a main 3 piece Duravit bathroom with the option of a rain shower.

All apartments benefit from a high specification throughout to include oak herringbone flooring, bespoke fitted kitchens, dedicated hyper optic internet provision and a state of the art fob entry system providing secure access throughout. The development also has a 24 hour concierge service.

Comprising elegant spacious apartments across four carefully designed towers, Deansgate Square delivers a new level of city centre living to Manchester. Marrying luxury living with unprecedented private on site amenities, with an iconic location in Manchester City Centre, Deansgate Square is on a new level. There are spacious roof top gardens and relaxation areas providing you with every facility to complete your job and embrace Manchester living at its best! The development includes state of the art facilities such as gymnasium, swimming pool, residents' roof terrace and much more. All included in the rent.

description:
About The Property

Be part of Manchester's ultimate community at Circle Square Apartments.

This fully furnished three-bedroom apartment, with views overlooking Symphony Park, comprises of an expansive open-plan kitchen, dining and living space, and three large bedrooms, each with its own substantial en-suite. Perfect for groups sharing, or larger families, they're your complete city centre base.


Unrivalled amenities


You will have access to two towers of communal spaces, six floors of coworking and lounge space, five free-to-use Private Dining Rooms and a high-spec, 24-hour gym and studio help to strike the ultimate work-life balance. Residents have access to weekly events which range from group hiit sessions and cocktail making classes through to arts and crafts, and pet events.

Step outside and you will find a collection of artisan bars, cafes, shops and restaurants which surround Symphony Park, a beautiful leafy-green oasis in the heart of the city.


Living area & kitchen


Relax and unwind. Vita Living's three-bedroom apartments offer a generous lounge space, floor-to-ceiling windows, and Juliet balcony. Sink into the luxurious L-shaped sofa and make the most of the extensive space. An incredible open plan home to relax with family or spend time with friends.

Cook, eat, and socialise in Vita Living's beautifully designed kitchens. Fully equipped with integrated Zanussi appliances, they include a washer/dryer, dishwasher, oven, four burner hob, and microwave. All Vita Living kitchens include super-matt handleless door and drawer fronts, with soft close hinges. Concealed LED lighting and premium tiled splashbacks compliment the contemporary worktops made from marble quartz. Completed by an underslung stainless-steel sink with monoblock mixer tap, full height pantry and utility cupboards.


Bedrooms & bathrooms


Three generously sized double bedrooms all come with their own luxurious en-suite bathroom and extensive floor-to-ceiling fitted wardrobes. Each bedroom offers a different signature feature: One with dual aspect views, one with a huge, feature rainfall shower, and the Master offers the luxury of a bath and floor-to-ceiling walk through wardrobe.

The three en-suite bathrooms come with rainfall showers, chrome ladder towel rails, Vitra sanitary ware featuring wall hung basins and wall hung WCs with concealed cisterns and soft close seats. Large shower screens and ceramic tiled walls. Bespoke mirrored doors, built in shaver socket and mood lighting.


Location


Situated in the central M1 area of Manchester, Circle Square Apartments are on the doorstep of some of Manchester’s finest bars and restaurants, whilst the Palace Theatre, Spinningfields, City Centre shopping hot spots and St. Peter’s Square are all within walking distance.


Travel links


To travel to and from Circle Square Apartments you will find yourself just a 2-minute walk from Oxford Road train station and Piccadilly a 10-minute walk away.


About our tours


Both in-person and virtual viewings are available via appointment.

title: Aurora Arbor Apartments
description:
First floor apartment**one bedroom apartment**stunning development**never lived in before**fully integrated appliances**brand new furniture**

Saxon square

Saxon square is a stunning residential conversion. The development is made up of 74 apartments which are spread across three blocks. This particular apartment is a large one bed and benefits from ample lighting throughout and follows a modern open-plan setting.

Location

Saxon Square is in a key location specifically chosen in-between these two commercial centres. Also to the North is The University of Salford. In terms of distances, it is just a 2-minute bus ride from the University of Salford which has over 20,000 students enrolled, a 3-minute bus journey to Media City UK which encompasses major employers such as Ericsson, Kellogg's, itv & bbc, and a 5-minute bus ride to Manchester City Centre.

Why live in salford?

views & A riverside location

You'll wake up to great views in Salford. The area has it all – from glistening water views over the riverside, to the bright lights of the media centres and cultural hubs. You'll find unique architecture including the Imperial War Museum and the unique design of The Lowry Theatre.

An array of fun and incredible entertainment

Even though you're on the cusp of the city centre hustle and bustle, you will never be bored in Salford. The area is home to an array of fitness activities, venues and clubs. You can go wakeboarding or canoeing, or if you're a big football fan, then home games at Old Trafford are just a short stroll away.

You won't need to head into Manchester to find great food and drink either, as Salford has an array of pubs, restaurants and bars.

Excellent employers

When it comes to Salford, the area's excellent employment opportunities attract a large number of driven professionals. MediaCity is now home to one of the largest media enterprise locations in the world. The area is the beating heart of film, TV and Radio in the UK.

Top transport links

The Metrolink offers a frequent and reliable service to all areas across Greater Manchester. Whether you're commuting to work or want a night out in town, jumping on the tram is incredibly easy. If you're travelling by car, Salford is just literally minutes away from the M602 motorway, which leads to the M60 and M62 network. This means you can be on your way to Liverpool, Leeds and beyond in no time.

description:
Clive Anthony are pleased to present a two bedroom 1st Floor Apartment, located within the heart of Didsbury, a truly impressive, two bedroomed, first floor apartment surrounded by magnificent gardens of the highest standard, individually designed and set within two award winning buildings.

The development is set back off Barlow Moor Road. This select gated development comprises of only sixteen contemporary apartments set within beautifully tended grounds.

Accommodation
The apartment has a communal hallway, private hall, large open plan living area (having its own private balcony) with spectacular views over the extensive communal gardens, superb fitted dining kitchen with granite work surfaces and integrated appliances fridge-freezer dishwasher, oven, hob and extractor fan, utility room with washing machine, guest WC, two large double bedrooms and two en suite bathroom facilities

Location
There is easy access to Didsbury Village where there is a wide range of restaurants, bars and shopping facilities and close to West Didsbury Village for it's bars, restaurants and cafes. For commuters Manchester City Centre lies approximately five miles away and is readily accessible via means of frequent bus services routed along either Kingsway (A34) or Wilmslow Road (A5145). Access to the National Motorway Network is also nearby and the property is within the catchment area of Parrswood High School.

The Development
Set back off Barlow Moor Road this select gated development comprises of only sixteen contemporary apartments set within beautifully tended grounds.

Finished to the very highest levels of specification the apartment features many state of the art luxuries such as under floor gas central heating, granite work surfaces, secure underground parking. The apartment has been wired to install electronic blinds, a 4mb high speed broadband connection, lift providing access to all floors and two parking spaces.

title: Mystic Moonbeam Apartments
description:
Nestled in the heart of Chorlton, just a stone's throw from Wilbraham Road, this ground floor flat offers unparalleled convenience. With the Metrolink station within easy walking distance, direct access to Manchester is made simple. Set in a small, well-maintained block of just four apartments, this home benefits from double glazing throughout, enhancing both comfort and energy efficiency.

Parking will never be an issue, as the property includes a designated space at the back of the development. Inside, you'll find a warm and inviting space, mostly adorned with plush carpeting, and accented by vinyl tiled-effect flooring in the hallway, kitchen, and bathroom.

The kitchen is well-equipped, with included appliances such as an electric cooker, freestanding fridge/freezer, washing machine, and dishwasher, simplifying daily living. The main bedroom features a spacious free-standing wardrobe, providing ample storage without sacrificing style.

One of the highlights of this property is the private garden, accessible through elegant French doors in the living room – a perfect spot for morning coffee or a relaxing evening retreat.

Please note, the development enforces a no-pets policy.

In addition, we've partnered with online lettings platform, Goodlord, to give you a speedy and hassle-free renting experience. Goodlord will guide you through the simple online application process that you can complete from anywhere, with digital contract signing and deposit payments, and give you access to exclusive offers and services, to help you into your new home.

Welcome to a home that truly appreciates your needs, blending functionality with the charm of central Chorlton living. Book a viewing today!

title: Verdant Valley Homes
description:
Property Reference: 1793984.

Beautiful industrial loft style apartment in Central Manchester
  • Available from 21st August 2023
  • 1 month to 7 months
  • All bills included
  • 2 private parking spaces provided

Located in a central yet peaceful spot right on the canal, this magnificent Manchester apartment has everything you need for a sensational stay in the city. It's only an eight-minute stroll from Dean's Gate, so you'll never be too far from the heart of the action. With central tram links reachable in walking distance and the train station being located closed by, this place is perfectly positioned for business and pleasure travellers alike.

The space

This beautifully appointed industrial loft apartment in Manchester makes for a truly memorable stay. There are two deluxe double bedrooms and, 1 spacious bathroom and an en-suite shower room.

Those travelling for work will be pleased to see a stylish home-working hub complete with a comfortable chair and desk lamp, along with a premium coffee machine in the kitchen. There are also two private parking spots in a secure car park, should you need them.

Unlike many other Manchester apartments for rent, this one comes with its own private balcony, accessed by floor-to-ceiling glass doors. Here, you'll find beautiful lounge furniture, ideal for idling away summer nights as the city goes to sleep, along with an outdoor bistro set for four.

Inside the living space, no detail is left unattended, from the inspirational interior design to state-of-the-art amenities. Tasteful touches such as a champagne cooler, cocktail glasses and a vintage record player all set the scene for an incredible trip to remember, while real plants and modern artwork help create an oasis of relaxation.

Other things to noteIt's 10 minutes to Old Trafford on a tram. The Etihad Stadium and Media City are close by too, this homely hub is ideal for those visiting to support their favourite football team or travelling as a budding business creative.

title: Ethereal Echo Apartments
description:
About The Property

Roof terraces
Resident lounges

Fully furnished apartments

No students accepted at this time.

Be part of Manchester's ultimate community at Circle Square Apartments.

This fully furnished three-bedroom apartment, with views overlooking Symphony Park, comprises of an expansive open-plan kitchen, dining and living space, and three large bedrooms, each with its own substantial en-suite. Perfect for groups sharing, or larger families, they're your complete city centre base.


Unrivalled amenities


You will have access to two towers of communal spaces, six floors of coworking and lounge space, five free-to-use Private Dining Rooms and a high-spec, 24-hour gym and studio help to strike the ultimate work-life balance. Residents have access to weekly events which range from group hiit sessions and cocktail making classes through to arts and crafts, and pet events.

Step outside and you will find a collection of artisan bars, cafes, shops and restaurants which surround Symphony Park, a beautiful leafy-green oasis in the heart of the city.


Living area & kitchen


Relax and unwind. Vita Living's three-bedroom apartments offer a generous lounge space, floor-to-ceiling windows, and Juliet balcony. Sink into the luxurious L-shaped sofa and make the most of the extensive space. An incredible open plan home to relax with family or spend time with friends.

Cook, eat, and socialise in Vita Living's beautifully designed kitchens. Fully equipped with integrated Zanussi appliances, they include a washer/dryer, dishwasher, oven, four burner hob, and microwave. All Vita Living kitchens include super-matt handleless door and drawer fronts, with soft close hinges. Concealed LED lighting and premium tiled splashbacks compliment the contemporary worktops made from marble quartz. Completed by an underslung stainless-steel sink with monoblock mixer tap, full height pantry and utility cupboards.


Bedrooms & bathrooms


Three generously sized double bedrooms all come with their own luxurious en-suite bathroom and extensive floor-to-ceiling fitted wardrobes. Each bedroom offers a different signature feature: One with dual aspect views, one with a huge, feature rainfall shower, and the Master offers the luxury of a bath and floor-to-ceiling walk through wardrobe.

The three en-suite bathrooms come with rainfall showers, chrome ladder towel rails, Vitra sanitary ware featuring wall hung basins and wall hung WCs with concealed cisterns and soft close seats. Large shower screens and ceramic tiled walls. Bespoke mirrored doors, built in shaver socket and mood lighting.


Location


Situated in the central M1 area of Manchester, Circle Square Apartments are on the doorstep of some of Manchester’s finest bars and restaurants, whilst the Palace Theatre, Spinningfields, City Centre shopping hot spots and St. Peter’s Square are all within walking distance.


Travel links


To travel to and from Circle Square Apartments you will find yourself just a 2-minute walk from Oxford Road train station and Piccadilly a 10-minute walk away.


About our tours


Both in-person and virtual viewings are available via appointment.

519 North

title: Aurora Atrium Homes
description:
This magnificently restored four storey Georgian townhouse offers c3000 sqft of exquisite living accommodation.

One of the finest houses in Manchester. The original houses on St John Street dates back to around 1785, and these townhouses were used as residential dwellings until around the 1850's.

Benefits from three bedrooms, two separate living areas, formal & casual dining areas every inch of this property has been renovated & immaculately designed to the highest of standards. Furthermore the basement has been sympathetically restored to create a further entertaining area with bespoke bar, wine storage and a separate utility room.

Available to rent immediately.

History

The special architectural and historic interest of St John Street townhouses as a whole is recognised by their Grade II Listed designation. The significance of the buildings primarily lies in their early date of construction and their group value on St John Street. The first townhouse is thought to have been constructed on the south side of St John Street at around a date of 1785. The street forms the main focus and reason for the designation of the St John Street Conservation Area. The houses are thought to have been used as residential dwellings up until around the 1850’s and more recently as medical consulting rooms.

Specification

The townhouse has been restored and renovated to its former glory, by utilising the highest of specification available, to include marble cloud tiling with underfloor heating to hallway and kitchen areas.

The bespoke contemporary kitchen has been designed by Stuart Frazer and retains original fireplaces within the contemporary new kitchen.

Three double bedrooms are complemented by a further two bespoke en-suite bathrooms and a further family bathroom.

There are living / dining areas on both the ground and second floors, and a further study.

The townhouse is furnished to the very highest of standards with no expense spared on the fixtures and fittings throughout the home.

The basement level adds an extra dimension to the townhouse, having been beautifully converted to add a further entertaining area with bespoke bar, utility room and wine cellar.

Located on the corner of Christopher and Windsor Street, you will find this stunning development. The development is a handsome refurbishment conveniently located next to key transport nodes into the City Centre. The building consists of 72 one and two bedroom apartments, following an open plan design setting with ample natural lighting through wall-to-wall windows.

Excellent specification

internal finishes

- Windows replaced with new UPVC in a sleek grey finish
- Veneer finished doors in gloss white with white chrome handles
- Skirting and architraves in softwood or mdf

walls and ceilings

- Finished with plasterboard
- Full height ceramic tiling to shower/bath areas
- White colour paint on ceilings and woodwork
- Natural hessian emulsion paint on walls

flooring

Wood effect vinyl plank in kitchen areas, bathrooms and En-suites

kitchens

- Carron phoenix single bowl stainless steel sink with chrome mixer tap
- Electric oven(Zanussi or equivalent)
- Ceramic hob(Zanussi or equivalent)
- Indesit 60cm chimney extractor hood and glass splash back
- Space for washing machine in cylinder cupboard
- Integrated fridge(Zanussi or equivalent)
- Pressurised cylinder hot water system
- Worktops and up-stands finished in black Everest crystal colour

bathrooms and en-suites

- White close-coupled toilet with chrome dual flush
- White hand basin set in driftwood vanity unit with chrome tap
- White bath with chrome mixed shower, riser rail and single glass shower screen
- Tiles to full height in wet areas and half height to rest of bathroom

electric and lighting

- Standard light pendants to all rooms with low energy light fittings and chrome downlights to kitchen areas and bathrooms
- Switches, sockets and other electrical outlets in white plastic
- Telephone operated main front door entry system
- sky Q satellite facility at the back of the TV point
- Heat detectors installed in kitchens and mains
- Telephone outlet point pre-wired in living room
- Pressurised cylinder hot water system and electric panel heaters for heating

why live in salford?

views & A riverside location

You'll wake up to great views in Salford. The area has it all – from glistening water views over the riverside, to the bright lights of the media centres and cultural hubs. You'll find unique architecture including the Imperial War Museum and the unique design of The Lowry Theatre.

An array of fun and incredible entertainment

Even though you're on the cusp of the city centre hustle and bustle, you will never be bored in Salford. The area is home to an array of fitness activities, venues and clubs. You can go wakeboarding or canoeing, or if you're a big football fan, then home games at Old Trafford are just a short stroll away.

You won't need to head into Manchester to find great food and drink either, as Salford has an array of pubs, restaurants and bars.

Excellent employers

When it comes to Salford, the area's excellent employment opportunities attract a large number of driven professionals. MediaCity is now home to one of the largest media enterprise locations in the world. The area is the beating heart of film, TV and Radio in the UK.

Top transport links

The Metrolink offers a frequent and reliable service to all areas across Greater Manchester. Whether you're commuting to work or want a night out in town, jumping on the tram is incredibly easy. If you're travelling by car, Salford is just literally minutes away from the M602 motorway, which leads to the M60 and M62 network. This means you can be on your way to Liverpool, Leeds and beyond in no time.
